summary: THIS ISSUE CAUSED MY CAR TO MISFIRE SO BAD I WAS UNABLE TO GET MY CAR TO ACCELERATE AND NEARLY CAUSED AN ACCIDENT. THIS ISSUE COULD LEAVE MANY STRANDED AND HAS ALREADY CAUSED MAJOR PROBLEMS FOR HUNDREDS OF OWNERS. *PH  *JB    **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS**770852
